public abstract class SimpleOneStepWranglerRefactoring
extends SimpleWranglerRefactoring

This kind of Refactoring class is used when a refactoring only needs a single input and does not have any other interactions. e.g. rename variable

If the refactoring returns with a warning message, wrangler should know that the user asked to continue. It is done by calling a function.
